Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Punchline: A collection of quality of life tweaks.
Changelog:
Update for Patch 6.5.

HaselTweaks

- Added: Options that automatically send network requests are now marked with a yellow bolt  icon. Not that anything has happened, but I just wanted to let the user know that they are using it at their own risk.
  - At the moment this only applies to Portrait Helper.

New Tweak: Glamour Dresser Armoire Alert

Opens a small window next to the Glamour Dresser with a list of items that can be stored in the Armoire (only visible if qualified items were found).

Enhanced Experience Bar

- Fixed: Companion Bar no longer shows 0/0 experience on rank 20.

Material Allocation

- Fixed: Sanctuary Gathering Log did not update the map for items gathered in the cave.

Scrollable Tabs

- Fixed: Due to an incorrect tab count, it was possible to scroll into hidden tabs of the Key Items window (normal inventory).

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Changelog:
A lot of internal restructuring due to my new HaselCommon library, which is now used in all my plugins. I hope it works fine!

- Changed: The configuration, previously a tab, has been moved to its own window and can be opened either via Dalamuds Plugin Installer or via `/lh config` in chat.
- Added: The plugin language can now be changed in the configuration.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: MogMogCheck
Description:
MogMogCheck is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Moogle Treasure Trove event (called Mog Mog Kollektion in German, hence the name).

The Rewards tab lists items of the "Newest ... Tomestone Exchange" shop with their collection status and price.  
You can also check the boxes to keep track of how many Tomestones you need at the top.

The Duties tab lists all the duties that reward Tomestones for the event.  
Clicking on a duty will open the Duty Finder with that duty selected.
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Moogle Treasure Trove rewards
Changelog:
- Added: Hovering over an item icon in the rewards table will now show a preview for emotes, fashion accessories, hairstyles, minions, mounts, paintings, and Triple Triad cards. Otherwise, just a slightly larger icon.
- Added: The Rewards column in the Duties table now shows the amount for wins, losses, and ties for PvP Duties.
